title: GIFTING BUG RIOT PLEASE
body:
There's a gifting but post- game. Here's what it says. 


http://i.gyazo.com/801a14e6140f2d1114ee81c7c10c5ff8.png


been like 5 minutes no difference. I can't gift the dude who deserved it....

replies.body: This has been fixed, thank you so much for bringing awareness to us. If you see any other issues, please let me know.

Sorry for the late response here, but at a glance, there does seem to be a problem at this time. We are still investigating now and really sorry you weren't able to gift the deserving summoner.

For now, can you try friending them and gifting them that way.

I will update you a.s.a.p.

>Not uploading the screenshot as an attachment.

There have been some issues with the servers, concerning people lagging and whatnot. It might be a remnant of that.
